posts.post_content: I know why he and [Eastern Paladin](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Eastern Paladin) can't target permanents. Back in the day, before Planar Chaos (I'm looking at you, [Reality Acid](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Reality Acid)), Blue and Black had no means of enchantment control and very [few](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?multiverseid=202534), [overcosted](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?multiverseid=3303) ways of destroying artifacts.
posts.html:
I know why he and Eastern Paladin can't target permanents. Back in the day, before Planar Chaos (I'm looking at you, Reality Acid), Blue and Black had no means of enchantment control and very few, overcosted ways of destroying artifacts.
